item.title: NetApp技术学习
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: [caption id=“attachment_52271” align=“aligncenter” width=“300”] sales-ilt-se-asap-rev07[/caption] 今天参加了NetApp Accredited Storage Architect Professional Workshop。这个课程偏售前，讲的还是不错，一共3天，明天开始做Lab，实验练习的环境就是在ON
